channel.title: Barrage (delta)help plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
channel.description:
hey guyz can any1 tell me how do i make barrage stop ppl in delta source?
where do i search for wat?
plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
also how do i make my dds spec? it dosn't spec at all:(

item.title: Barrage (delta)help plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0
item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

its not working i changed the spell time to here it is:

public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) { if (spell == 12861) { return 10000; } if (spell == 12881) { return 20000; } if (spell == 12871) { return 30000; } if (spell == 12891) { return 60000; } if (spell == 1572) { return 10000; } if (spell == 1582) { return 20000; } if (spell == 1592) { return 30000; } return 30;

can you plz do somthing i realy want this plz

and for dds it this

// pk: 2726 9193 private boolean Attack() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; if(hasKnife()){ sM("Knives are disabled for now!"); ResetAttack(); return false; } if(hitID != AttackingOn2.playerId && hitID != 0 && !multiCombat()){ sM("I'm already under attack."); ResetAttack(); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); return false; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2009, 03:50:09 pm[/size][hr]s

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage (delta)help plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I already answered this a couple days ago…
Go to your client class and search -

public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) {

You should get something like this -

public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) { if (spell == 12861) { return 10000; } if (spell == 12881) { return 20000; } if (spell == 12871) { return 30000; } if (spell == 12891) { return 40000; } if (spell == 1572) { return 10000; } if (spell == 1582) { return 20000; } if (spell == 1592) { return 30000; }
Find the spell ID of barrage, and change the timer.

As for the DDS Special, add this under your private boolean Attack() method -

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }

Add this under your private boolean AttackNPC() method -

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); usingSpecial = true; }

Then, open up your special class and search for -

switch(item) {

There should be a list of numbers under it. Under the last case, add -

case 5698:

You should have two places to add it to.

Reply with any errors.

Read full topic
